channel.title: ---server help---
channel.description:
1.aight i just added dragon claws to my server and client, but how do i make it have a special attack??
2. any1 got a cool yell that shows [owner] blah blah and stuff?
3.ty for helping

item.title: ---server help---
item.dc:creator: @tony0806 tony0806
item.description:
@tony0806 wrote:

[code]} else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) {

if (muted == 1) {
sendMessage(“You are muted and cannot yell!”);
} else {

String whatToYell = command.substring(5);
whatToYell.replaceAll(“no-ip”, “imgay”);
whatToYell.replaceAll(“servegame”, “imgay”);
whatToYell.trim();

if(playerRights==0) {
playerHandler.messageToAll = “[”+playerName+"]: "+whatToYell;
} else if(playerRights==1) {
playerHandler.messageToAll = "[Mod “+playerName+”]: "+whatToYell;
} else if(playerRights==2) {
playerHandler.messageToAll = "[Admin “+playerName+”]: "+whatToYell;
} else if(playerRights==3 || !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ownerName”)) {
playerHandler.messageToAll = "[Co-Owner “+playerName+”]: "+whatToYell;
} else if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ownerName”)) {
playerHandler.messageToAll = "[Owner “+playerName+”]: "+whatToYell;
}
}

}[/code]

wut some1 gave meh

Read full topic

item.title: ---server help---
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights <= 2) { String text = command.substring(5); yell("["+playerName+"] - " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); { else if { p.rights = 3 try { yellyell("[owner] - " + Character.toUpperCase }

Try something like that.

I am not that good at coding so that probably wont work. Try and edit it so it will work
